text: with Amazon chime you don't have to use
a new product to schedule meetings with
Amazon chime you can just use your
existing calendar app if you're using
outlook on a Mac or another calendar
program this video shows you how to
schedule Amazon chime meetings let's
start by launching the Amazon chime app
from the Launchpad choose meetings and
schedule a meeting this brings up the
schedule meeting assistant to schedule
an outlook for Mac or another program
make sure to choose other is the
calendar application
while you are in the schedule meeting
assistant you can configure your meeting
settings this includes selecting dial-in
numbers for your
attendees if you have international
dials available a link is displayed here
to add countries or toll-free options
choose the link and select diin to
include Amazon chime will add them to
your meeting
instructions you also select either a
personal meeting ID or a one-time
meeting ID the personal meeting ID was
assigned when you created your account
account use it for internal or team
meetings this number is the same for all
meetings you schedule using Amazon chime
this makes it easier for you to remember
and to share with
others if you are scheduling
back-to-back meetings overlapping or
highly confidential meeting choose the
onetime meeting ID Amazon chime
generates a special 10-digit pen that
you can use for a single meeting event
or for a recurring series let's go ahead
and choose a one-time meeting ID after
you finalize the meeting settings create
your meeting by following the steps to
schedule a meeting and using the copy
buttons to get the information and paste
it into your calendar
invite for this example let's go to an
Outlook calendar on a Mac and double
click on the time and date to schedule
our meeting fill out the invite as you
normally would with attendees subject
and location then return to the Amazon
chime schedule meeting
assistant under steps to schedule a
meeting choose the copy button
associated with step two then return to
your meeting
invite paste the meet atchim AWS email
and pin plus number in the two field
when you choose a one-time meeting ID
the pin plus number is also included the
meet at chime AWS email address enables
Amazon Chimes autoc call feature when
you include these email addresses Amazon
chime receives the meeting name date
time and attendee details the meeting
will automatically start for registered
attendees at the scheduled
time return to the schedule meeting
assistant and choose the copy button
associated with step three to grab the
sample meeting
instructions paste that information into
the meeting invite then choose send and
send invitation another thing you can do
is add Amazon chime to an existing
meeting to do this go to the Amazon
chime app select meetings from the
Launchpad and then then schedule meeting
in the calendar application dropdown
choose other as your calendar Define
your meeting settings and then choose
copy associated with step
two go to your calendar and open the
meeting you want to
update paste the attendee details in the
two
field return to the schedule meeting
assistant and copy the meeting
instructions return to the meeting
invite and paste the instructions into
the invite
then choose save and send choose to send
the update to all so everyone receives
the meeting
details that's all there is to
scheduling meetings with Amazon chime
